gui.swordskill.title: Select Skill
gui.swordskill.select_slot: Select a slot to save the skill to?
swordskill.skill.how_to_use.description:
Sword Skill Tutorial!!
Use A or D to select a skill.
Then, press the corresponding key to assign it to slots 0-4.
While holding the Sword Skill selection key, 
scroll the mouse wheel to quickly select skills!
Finally, press the Sword Skill use key to finish the tutorial!
Enjoy!!
swordskill.skill.horizontal.description:
Sweep your sword horizontally, clearing out enemies.
Derivative Sword Skills: Horizontal Arc -> Horizontal Square
swordskill.skill.vertical.description: Bring your sword down from above to slay your foes.
swordskill.skill.sharp_neil.description:
Release three red slashes forward.
Heal 20% of the damage dealt as HP.
swordskill.skill.holy_cross_brade.descri:
A slash that cuts a cross and banishes the undead.
Deals triple damage to undead.
swordskill.skill.rage_spike.description:
Instantly close distance and cut down the enemy.
Damage increases with movement speed.
swordskill.skill.sonic_reap.description:
A skill that flies at sound-breaking speed and pierces the enemy.
Damage increases with movement speed.
swordskill.skill.savage_fulcrum.descript: A three-hit combo with a thrust to tear apart your opponent.
swordskill.skill.howling_octave.descript: Unleash a high-speed thrust to slice the enemy in half.
swordskill.skill.vorpal_strike.descripti: A single, powerful heavy attack skill with long range and high damage.
swordskill.skill.star_sword.description: Draw a star shape with a slash imbued with the power of holy stars.
swordskill.skill.wall_wind.description: Spin the weapon like a whirlwind, blowing away any enemy.
swordskill.skill.blood_finisher.descript:
Gouge the enemy's wounds with high damage and slice them in half.
Deals 2.5x damage if the target's HP is below half.
swordskill.skill.excite.description:
Swing the weapon horizontally to clear out enemies.
Derivative Sword Skills: Excite Line -> Excite Triangle
swordskill.skill.king_axe.description:
Show the majesty of the king with a single blow.
Deals an additional 50% magic damage.
swordskill.skill.lumber_jack.description: Swing the axe down and rotate it twice with the momentum.
swordskill.skill.grand_upper.description: Cut upwards with the axe from below, launching the enemy into the air.
swordskill.skill.ryuuko_souhaku.descript: The ultimate technique used by veteran axe masters.
swordskill.skill.thrusts.description: Pierce the enemy with a spear, inflicting heavy damage
swordskill.skill.spinning_spear.descript: Pierce a single point and sweep away approaching enemies with the shaft.
swordskill.skill.spark_thrust.descriptio: Thrust horizontally at three points, then sweep with the shaft.
swordskill.skill.sorvelte_charge.descrip: Dive into the enemy's space and pierce a single point. High power, but difficult to land.
swordskill.skill.longlonglong.descriptio: Charge up and pierce a single point, unleashing abnormal range and power.
swordskill.skill.falling_star.descriptio: Fly in the direction of your view, then re-accelerate in mid-air and charge at the enemy after 0.5 seconds.
swordskill.skill.end_revolver.descriptio: Spin with swords in both hands, releasing slashes around you.
swordskill.skill.ascade_refraction.descr:
Release slashes in a cross shape with swords in both hands, 
then release a horizontal slash.
swordskill.skill.double_circular.descrip: Unleash a four-hit combo on a rushing enemy.
swordskill.skill.star_burst_stream.descr: A dazzling 16-hit combo, like a meteor storm.
swordskill.skill.the_eclipse.description: Ultimate Dual Blades 27-Combo Sword Skill. Mastery of Dual Blades
swordskill.skill.reaper.description: Unleashes a fiery trail-infused slash upon the target
swordskill.skill.sakura_mai.description: A dash attack skill, like cherry blossoms dancing in the wind
swordskill.skill.zekku.description: Releases an attack that rends the air.
swordskill.skill.tumuzi_guruma.descripti: Spins and sweeps away surrounding targets
swordskill.skill.gengetu.description: A single, powerful sword skill with random upper or down attacks from the same motion.
swordskill.skill.hiougi.description: A scarlet track hunts down the target
swordskill.skill.cascade.description: Slashes enemies vertically with a greatsword
swordskill.skill.aban_rash.description: Charges forward while swinging down a greatsword
swordskill.skill.cyclone.description: Slices targets horizontally with a greatsword
swordskill.skill.stan_hazard.description: Five consecutive sword skill. Annihilates the target with high damage attacks.
swordskill.skill.slash_blade.description: Execute a ranged slash attack by swinging your greatsword with maximum force.
swordskill.skill.linear.description: Thrust at a single point, dealing high damage.
swordskill.skill.cruci_fiction.descripti: Draws a cross with six strikes: three vertical and three horizontal.
swordskill.skill.star_splash.description: An 8-hit sword skill with constellation-like thrusts and dazzling light effects.
swordskill.skill.stary_tier.description: A 5-hit original sword skill that traces a star shape.
swordskill.skill.mothers_rosario.descrip: An original sword skill created by a certain girl. The ultimate 11-hit combo.
swordskill.skill.shooting_star.descripti: A high-damage sword skill that launches a swift, piercing thrust.
swordskill.skill.flashing_penetrator.des: Charges at the enemy, dealing high damage and knockback to all enemies in the path.
swordskill.skill.canine.description: Swings the sword at high speed, though with a short range.
swordskill.skill.face_liner.description: Unleashes rapid thrusts, taking advantage of the dagger's inherent speed.
swordskill.skill.fad_edge.description: Delivers a powerful strike utilizing the entire body to inflict significant damage on the enemy.
swordskill.skill.rapid_bite.description:
Leaps into the air and descends upon the enemy's head, unleashing a high-damage thrust fueled by momentum.
Successfully landing an attack significantly reduces the cooldown.
swordskill.skill.octagon_edge.descriptio: Unleashes a rapid, eight-sided slash tracing the vertices of an octagon.
swordskill.skill.kodati.description: Unleashes a blue shockwave by rapidly wielding a short sword.
